DOC.brief_summary: This study aim evaluate safety efficacy MT-3995 administer long term , follow MT-3995-J05 study .
DOC.brief_title: An Extended Treatment Study MT-3995 Patients With Diabetic Nephropathy
DOC.criteria: Written inform consent participation completion MT3995J05 Study Completion MT3995J05 study UACR ≥300 mg/g Cr increase ≥30 % MT3995J05 Study Symptomatic clinically significant hypotension QT prolongation torsades de point New York Heart Association ( NYHA ) Class III IV heart failure Patients judge unsuitable participation base safety profile MT3995J05 Study
